snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta made an unannounced visit to Afghanistan on Wednesday to discuss future deployment plans with Gen. John R. Allen, the top American commander.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta makes unannounced visit to Afghanistan to meet with senior commanders and discuss proposals for future troop levels that he says will be presented to Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta made an unannounced visit to Afghanistan on Wednesday to discuss future deployment plans with Gen. John R. Allen, the top American commander.

headline.seo: Panetta Visits Afghanistan to Discuss Troop Levels
headline.main: Panetta Visits Afghanistan to Discuss Troop Levels
headline.print_headline:
Afghanistan: Panetta Visits Nation
To Discuss Future Troop Levels
